010package Color_Quantization;
011
012
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.io.LogStream;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
018import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
019import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
020import imagingbook.common.color.quantize.OctreeQuantizer;
021
022
023
024/**
025 * ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the {@link OctreeQuantizer} class.
026 * 
027 * @author WB
028 * @version 2022/02/25
029 */
030public class Octree_Quantization implements PlugInFilter {
031        
032        private static int K = 16;
033        private static boolean QUICK = false;
034        
035        private static boolean CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE = true; 
036        private static boolean CREATE_RGB_IMAGE = false;
037        private static boolean LIST_COLOR_TABLE = false;
038
039        static {
040                LogStream.redirectSystem();
041        }
042        
043        String title;
044
045        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
046                this.title = imp.getShortTitle();
047                return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
048        }
049
050        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
051                                
052                if (!showDialog())
053                        return;
054
055                ColorProcessor cp = (ColorProcessor) ip;
056                int[] pixels = (int[]) cp.getPixels();
057
058                OctreeQuantizer quantizer = new OctreeQuantizer(pixels, K);
059                quantizer.setQuickQuantization(QUICK);
060                
061                int nCols = quantizer.getColorMap().length;
062                
063                String qck = QUICK ? " quick" : "";
064                
065                if (LIST_COLOR_TABLE) {
066                        quantizer.listColorMap();
067                }
068                
069                if (CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE) {
070                        // quantize to an indexed color image
071                        ByteProcessor qip = quantizer.quantize(cp);
072                        (new ImagePlus(title + "Octree" + nCols + qck, qip)).show();
073                }
074                
075//              if (CREATE_RGB_IMAGE) {
076//                      // quantize to a full-color RGB image
077//                      int[] rgbPix = quantizer.quantize((int[]) pixels);
078//                      ColorProcessor rgbIp = new ColorProcessor(cp.getWidth(), cp.getHeight(), rgbPix);
079//                      (new ImagePlus("Quantized RGB Image (" + nCols + " colors)" + qck, rgbIp)).show();
080//              }
081                
082        }
083        
084        private boolean showDialog() {
085                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(Median_Cut_Quantization.class.getSimpleName());
086                gd.addNumericField("No. of colors (2,..,256)", K, 0);
087                gd.addCheckbox("Use quick quantization", QUICK);
088                gd.addCheckbox("Create indexed color image", CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE);
089                gd.addCheckbox("Create quantized RGB image", CREATE_RGB_IMAGE);
090                gd.addCheckbox("List quantized color table", LIST_COLOR_TABLE);
091                
092                gd.showDialog();
093                if (gd.wasCanceled())
094                        return false;
095                
096                int nc = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
097                nc = Math.min(nc, 255);
098                nc = Math.max(2, nc);
099                
100                K = nc;
101                QUICK = gd.getNextBoolean();
102                
103                CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE = gd.getNextBoolean();
104                CREATE_RGB_IMAGE = gd.getNextBoolean();
105                LIST_COLOR_TABLE = gd.getNextBoolean();
106                return true;
107        }
108
109//      private void shuffleArray(int[] ar) {
110//              Random rnd = ThreadLocalRandom.current();
111//              for (int i = ar.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
112//                      int index = rnd.nextInt(i + 1);
113//                      // Simple swap
114//                      int a = ar[index];
115//                      ar[index] = ar[i];
116//                      ar[i] = a;
117//              }
118//      }
119
120}
